28 // %Tag(FULLTEXT)%
29 // %Tag(C++_HEADER)%
30 #include <sstream>
31 // %EndTag(C++_HEADER)%
32 // %Tag(ROS_HEADER)%
33 #include "ros/ros.h"
34 // %EndTag(ROS_HEADER)%
35 // %Tag(MSG_HEADER)%
36 #include "std_msgs/String.h"
37 // %EndTag(MSG_HEADER)%
38 
39 
40 
44 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
55 // %Tag(INIT)%
56  ros::init(argc, argv, "talker");
57 // %EndTag(INIT)%
63 // %Tag(NODEHANDLE)%
64  ros::NodeHandle n;
65 // %EndTag(NODEHANDLE)%
83 // %Tag(PUBLISHER)%
84  ros::Publisher chatter_pub = n.advertise<std_msgs::String>("chatter", 1000);
85 // %EndTag(PUBLISHER)%
86 // %Tag(LOOP_RATE)%
87  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
88 // %EndTag(LOOP_RATE)%
93 // %Tag(ROS_OK)%
94  int count = 0;
95  while (ros::ok()) {
96 // %EndTag(ROS_OK)%
100 // %Tag(FILL_MESSAGE)%
101  std_msgs::String msg;
102  std::stringstream ss;
103  ss << "hello world " << count;
104  msg.data = ss.str();
105 // %EndTag(FILL_MESSAGE)%
106 // %Tag(ROSCONSOLE)%
107  ROS_INFO("%s", msg.data.c_str());
108 // %EndTag(ROSCONSOLE)%
115 // %Tag(PUBLISH)%
116  chatter_pub.publish(msg);
117 // %EndTag(PUBLISH)%
118 // %Tag(SPINONCE)%
119  ros::spinOnce();
120 // %EndTag(SPINONCE)%
121 // %Tag(RATE_SLEEP)%
122  loop_rate.sleep();
123 // %EndTag(RATE_SLEEP)%
124  ++count;
125  }
126  return 0;
127 }
128 // %EndTag(FULLTEXT)%
main
int main(int argc, char **argv)
